GSP30vamsbum_u:3: gṛhyate pañcabhis tac ca cakṣurādibhir indriyaiḥ // 2 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:4: cakṣuḥ sarvāsv avasthāsu dehināṃ manasi sthitam /
GSP30vamsbum_u:5: tat pralīnaṃ bhaved yasya tasya sarvaṃ pralīyate // 3 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:9: vastuto na tu tāḥ santi niścityaitac chamaṃ vrajet // 5 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:11: na budbude na peṣyāṃ vā na śarīre kvacit sthitam // 6 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:14: pṛthag nāma pṛthag rūpaṃ lomādīnāṃ pṛthak sthitiḥ /
GSP30vamsbum_u:15: pṛthak sarvaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ kva śarīraṃ tadā sthitam // 8 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:16: evam eva vicāryoktā jātis tathaiva bādhyate /
GSP30vamsbum_u:17: na ca sā vastuto yuktā kasyacid vāvabhāsate // 9 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:18: nāma pitrā kṛtaṃ mithyā kriyā na niyatā yataḥ /
GSP30vamsbum_u:19: guṇī yadi bhavet kaścid bhavanti bahavo guṇāḥ // 10 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:24: grāhyaṃ yac ca bhavet kiñcit tat tal līnaṃ tadā bhavet /
GSP30vamsbum_u:26: yathā ghanasvane sāndre krameṇa vilayaṃ gate /
GSP30vamsbum_u:28: yad yan manoharaṃ kiṃcic chrutigocaram āgatam /
GSP30vamsbum_u:29: ekāgraṃ bhāvayet tāvad yāval līnaṃ nirodhakṛt // 15 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:36: sarvarāgāt sahāniḥ syāt sarvadveṣāt tathaiva ca /
GSP30vamsbum_u:37: baddhavat sarvarāgī syāt sarvadveṣṭā ca bhairavaḥ // 19 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:38: agrāhyam indriyaṃ śūnyaṃ svātmany eva pralīyate /
GSP30vamsbum_u:43: dhyāyato vā kim apy antaḥ pratyante kevalaṃ bhavet // 22 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:48: āsane 'py upaviṣṭasya kva me cittam avasthitam /
GSP30vamsbum_u:51: na ca citte sthito vāyur na vāyau cittam āsthitam // 26 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:52: evaṃ vimṛśato bhāvān na kvacit saṃsthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP30vamsbum_u:53: mithaiva vṛttayas tasya sarvathā kevalaṃ sthitam // 27 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:54: yatra yatra bhaved vāñchā bhojanādiṣu vastuṣu /
GSP30vamsbum_u:55: pūrayet tām yathāśakti bhavet pūrṇo nirāśrayaḥ // 28 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:56: vāñchitaṃ gaditaṃ kiñcid akasmād yadi vismṛtam /
GSP30vamsbum_u:58: sthānuḥ syāt puruṣo veti dūrād dṛśye vikalpite /
GSP30vamsbum_u:60: dṛśyaiḥ padārthair draṣṭāraṃ paśyed buddhyā yato dṛśaḥ /
GSP30vamsbum_u:61: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mokṣam āpnoti yo na tadvat sa badhyate // 31 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:62: ālambya saṃvidaṃ yatnāt saṃvedyaṃ na svabhāvataḥ /
GSP30vamsbum_u:63: tasmāt saṃviditaṃ sarvam iti saṃvinmayo bhavet // 32 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:65: tathaiva kṣīṇavṛttiḥ syād apāne vilayaṃ gate // 33 //
GSP30vamsbum_u:70: ūrdhvam ākramato vāyor udgatānte śamo bhavet /
GSP30vamsbum_u:85: itthaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ yasya cittam ātmani līyate /
